channel.title: awesome on patrolli
channel.description: Recent content in awesome on patrolli

item.title: awesome action recognition
item.description: Egocentric Interactive Prototype Learning for Egocentric Action Recognition Epic-Kitchen 的数据集，将识别动作分解成识别 verb 和 noun. 文章首先得到 verb 的 prototype (verb classifier 权重的 l2 normalization), 然后用这个 prototype 去和 3D feature map 的所有 grid (TxHxW) vector 计算响应，来得到与动
